column.name: observationId
column.comment: Table primary key, used in relations

column.name: featureOfInterestId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related featureOfInterest. Contains "featureOfInterest".featureOfInterestId

column.name: observablePropertyId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related observableProperty. Contains "observableproperty".observablepropertyid

column.name: procedureId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related procedure. Contains "procedure".procedureid

column.name: phenomenonTimeStart
column.comment: Time stamp when the observation was started or phenomenon was observed

column.name: phenomenonTimeEnd
column.comment: Time stamp when the observation was stopped or phenomenon was observed

column.name: resultTime
column.comment: Time stamp when the observation was published or result was published/available

column.name: identifier
column.comment: The identifier of the observation, gml:identifier. Used as parameter for queries. Optional but unique

column.name: codespace
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:identifier codespace. Optional

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the observation, gml:name. Optional

column.name: codespaceName
column.comment: The name of the observation, gml:name. Optional

column.name: description
column.comment: Description of the observation, gml:description. Optional

column.name: deleted
column.comment: Flag to indicate that this observation is deleted or not (OGC SWES 2.0 - DeleteSensor operation or not specified DeleteObservation)

column.name: validTimeStart
column.comment: Start time stamp for which the observation/result is valid, e.g. used for forecasting. Optional

column.name: validTimeEnd
column.comment: End time stamp for which the observation/result is valid, e.g. used for forecasting. Optional

column.name: unitId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related unit of measure. Contains "unit".unitid. Optional

set.name: offerings
set.comment: Table to store relations between observation and associated offerings. Mapping file: mapping/ereporting/EReportingObservation.hbm.xml

column.name: observationId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related observation. Contains "observation".oobservationid

column.name: offeringId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related offering. Contains "offering".offeringid

column.name: samplingGeometry
column.comment: Sampling geometry describes exactly where the measurement has taken place. Used for OGC SOS 2.0 Spatial Filtering Profile. Optional
